text:
Local Government Order 2011

I make the following order under section 137(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

12 April 2011

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order 2011 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Northern Midlands Council
    The land situated at 24 Mary Street, Perth in Tasmania comprised in General Law Conveyance Number 8/3966 is transferred to the Northern Midlands Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 April 2011

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
